list.historyEntry: I'm getting the following error while building my project. The error is: Android resource linking failed ``` $ ./gradlew :app:processOpsDebugResources ERROR: /Users/john/AndroidStudioProjects/TFTong/yqad/build/intermediates/packaged_res/debug/packageDebugResources/layout/mix_native_item.xml:32: AAPT: error: resource mipmap/s2s_template_img_default_bg (aka com.chinarainbow.tft:mipmap/s2s_template_img_default_bg) not found. ``` How do I fix this?
